rows.label: tlk42300012_03_msg0001
rows.name: Friends know about shrine above here?

rows.label: tlk42300012_03_msg0002
rows.name:
Shrine has been around since time of
building of Goldmund, so they say.

rows.label: tlk42300012_03_msg0003
rows.name:
It dilapidated old place now though.
No one there any more.

rows.label: tlk42300012_03_msg0004
rows.name:
Is not usual place for Nopon to visit,
meaning it outside of Tondon's scope
for repairs.

rows.label: tlk42300012_03_msg0005
rows.name:
Even if it in ruins, is no need to report
to Tondon whatsoever.
